thread.title: Run Android 5.1 Lollipop with Google Play Store on Raspberry Pi 2 Using RaspAnd
thread.title_full: Run Android 5.1 Lollipop with Google Play Store on Raspberry Pi 2 Using RaspAnd - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Run Android 5.1 Lollipop with Google Play Store on Raspberry Pi 2 Using RaspAnd
text: Arne Exton was more than happy to drop an email to Softpedia HQ about the new release of his commercial RaspAnd project that lets users install Google's Android 5.1 Lollipop mobile operating system on a Raspberry Pi 2 SBC (Single-Board Computer). Some of our readers might remember RaspAnd since we introduced it earlier this year, as it was quite popular at that point in time. The new version of RaspAnd brings something new to users who want to run Android 5.1 Lollipop on a ... Â»
